- Analysed Australian workforce survey data using R, R Markdown, and Power BI to identify key factors influencing remote vs office work preferences, including industry, household composition, and organisational support.
- Performed time series forecasting of Canberraâ€™s monthly temperatures and global temperature anomalies using R and R Markdown.



International Islamic University, Islamabad, Pakistan

Thesis:
- Investigated the interrelationship between global warming, climate change, and air pollution using Vector Auto-Regressive (VAR) and Generalised Additive Models (GAMs).
- Compared the performance of Random Forest algorithms implemented in two different R packages.
